subject: Plus X pedals driver error
description_text: Hey there. I plugged plus x pedals, and after a short time the pedals stop responded. After reloading my PC, I see "disconnected" status in simsonn software, and "driver error" on a window devices screen. I have latest update of your software, and can't find how to load drivers manually. Can you help me?

conversations.body_text: Hi Олег Загнитко,     Please make sure the pedal’s USB is directly connected to the rear USB 3.0 (blue) port of your computer. Do not use a USB hub.  If the issue persists, please follow these steps:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the control box;    Connect the USB cable — at this point, SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 will show that the device has entered SIMSONN Flasher Mode;    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu;    After the update is complete, please test the device again.

Pressing button with reconnecting USB cable didn't change anything. Link to manual update is disabled, and not responded. I tried use older version of software, but result is the same. I guess that ilbutton is enabled only in case with older drivers.
I tried to delete drivers manually using window devices tab, but for some reason this option is disabled.
How I can remove drivers?
